fields.Summary: "Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user"
fields.Steps: 1) Login into the Application 2) Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User 3) Filled out all the user information fields 4) Clicked on the ‘Save’ button 5) Seen an error page 'ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…' 6) See the attached logs for more information 7) Also see the attached screenshot of the error page
fields.Actual: "Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user"
fields.Expected: "On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message 'New User has been created successfully'
